1606640.name: GrandMa Badass - a crazy point and click adventure
1606640.description:
Initially released in episodic format (episode 1 in May 2021 and episode 2 in September 2021), here is the complete game on 6 episodes that will land on Steam on November 22, 2022.

Very discreet in the video game press and not really highlighted on Steam as a novelty, being considered as an old game released in 2021, Grandma Badass is however the delight of all point and click fans who embark on the adventure of this teasing but endearing character, who evolves in a story that rises crescendo in action and madness ...

You just have to read the comments and reviews on the page to understand that this game only benefits from word of mouth and that only the most informed point and click players will have the chance and the happiness to live this rather crazy moment of playing an entertaining game, for a life span between 8 and 10 hours!

GRANDMA BADASS POINT AND CLICK

GrandMA Badass is a cartoon style 2D point and click game in which you will only need the mouse to control a 90 year old grandma who is going to live a life. extraordinary adventure.

You are going to plunge into the heart of an Adventure game that mixes riddles and puzzles with a twists and turns with various characters, each more charismatic than the other.

HISTORY

GrandMa certainly never imagined having to have such a lousy day.

And yet she had started so badly!

Woken up in the early morning by Marius, her hungry black cat, she will begin by disillusionment and understand that her day is not going to be the most pleasant ...

Forced to face the dangers of the Coronavirus and the vagaries of poverty, GrandMa will very quickly find herself in dirty stories, where she will have to rub shoulders with the underworld and the organized crime of her city ... to find her cat kidnapped in this dirty day…

FEATURES

Enter a fun and animated adventure, filled with characters with their own personalities and a big place in the story that evolves over the episodes, making GrandMa travel from her living room to the city, then to various distant countries ...

A point and click game in the style of old school games, with original dialogue in the form of bubbles, like in the comics.

  • Texts and descriptions of objects fully translated into English

  • Find the solution to many puzzles following a certain logic

  • Configure the game under several screen resolutions (4/5 box format for an old-school feel)

  • An intelligent quest log allows you to always stay up to date with your objectives and to find your way around easily

  • You can combine objects together to design new ones

  • You only need the mouse to control the game and the movements of GrandMa

  • The Prologue of the game is available for free on the demo (approximately 30 minutes of play minimum)

  • Each episode immerses you in an adventure lasting between 1 hour minimum and 3 hours or more.

  • Very simple dialogs with an icon display system in speech bubbles, like in a comic strip and an audio mix of languages ​​in a hilarious gibberish and perfectly understandable to all)

  • Backup system to secure yourself at any time or quit the game at any time!

  • No loading times in the game.

  • Between 8 and 10 hours of play depending on your Point and click levels

GrandMa Badass is a game logical enough never to lose the player and requires a minimum of observation and logic to complete each episode.

Dare to enter this universe and live an extraordinary experience in a fun, funny environment and through rather original gameplay and features ...
